posting_body: ['Schedule a Tour Today: <URL>', 'Discover the perfect place to call home at The Edison Apartments.', 'At our luxury apartments in Smyrna, GA, residents can choose from a variety one bedroom, two bedroom, and three bedroom homes and they can easily explore all that our community has to offer.', 'In each home, residents will find beautiful details like stainless steel appliances, spacious closets, and designer finishes.', 'Throughout the community at our Smyrna apartments, residents can take advantage of the stunning swimming pool, brand new clubhouse, and fully-equipped fitness center.', 'Amenities:', '-Large Closets', '-W/D Hookup', '-Faux-Wood Vinyl Flooring', '-Black Appliances or Stainless Steel Appliances Available', '-Ceiling Fans in Bedrooms', '-Beautiful', 'Lake', '-Brand New Fitness Center', '-Pet Friendly', '-Designer Finishes Available', '-Electric Vehicle Charging Stations', '-Crown Molding', '-Swimming Pool', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
